languages.text: "Десятина страдает, и мне известно об этом. Но мы не можем позволить себе операцию по захвату и устранению мятежников. Это повлечет за собой потери среди арбитров, а в нашей ситуации подобное недопустимо — здесь едва хватает людей, чтобы дежурить на орудиях планетарной обороны, не говоря уж о системах отгрузки контейнеров. Приходится следить лишь за тем, на что хватает рук. Пока что потери грузов находятся в рамках нормативов износа, установленных Администратумом".

traits.locale_text: "Десятина страдает, и мне известно об этом. Но мы не можем позволить себе операцию по захвату и устранению мятежников. Это повлечет за собой потери среди арбитров, а в нашей ситуации подобное недопустимо — здесь едва хватает людей, чтобы дежурить на орудиях планетарной обороны, не говоря уж о рычагах отгрузки контейнеров. Приходится следить лишь за тем, на что хватает рук".

"Десятина страдает, и мне известно об этом. Но мы не можем позволить себе операцию по захвату и устранению мятежников. Это повлечет за собой потери среди арбитров, а в нашей ситуации подобное недопустимо — здесь едва хватает людей, чтобы дежурить на орудиях планетарной обороны, не говоря уж о рычагах отгрузки контейнеров. Приходится следить лишь за тем, на что хватает рук".

languages.text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."
languages.original_text: "Десятина страдает, и мне известно об этом. Но мы не можем позволить себе операцию по захвату и устранению мятежников. Это повлечет за собой потери среди арбитров, а в нашей ситуации подобное недопустимо — здесь едва хватает людей, чтобы дежурить на орудиях планетарной обороны, не говоря уж системах отгрузки контейнеров. Приходится следить лишь за тем, на что хватает рук. Пока что потери грузов находятся в рамках нормативов износа, установленных Администратумом".

traits.locale_text: "The tithe is taking damage, and I am aware of it. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

"If by 'dealt with' you mean a combat operation to capture or eliminate the insurgents, then such a move would involve casualties among arbitrators or recruits. This is unacceptable. We protect the tithe from outside encroachment, and nothing more."

"The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

"The tithe is taking damage, and I am aware of it. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

languages.text: «Soy consciente del perjuicio que esto supone para la entrega del diezmo. Aun así, no podemos permitirnos un operativo para capturar o eliminar a los insurgentes que resultaría en bajas entre los Arbitrator, lo cual sería catastrófico dada nuestra situación actual. Casi no tenemos efectivos para montar guardia y manejar los sistemas de defensa planetaria, ¿quién se va a encargar de las operaciones de estiba? No tenemos más remedio que mantener el orden en la medida de nuestras posibilidades. De momento, la pérdida del cargamento no excede los parámetros contemplados por la normativa del Administratum».
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: «Soy consciente del perjuicio que esto supone para la entrega del diezmo. Aun así, no podemos permitirnos un operativo para capturar o eliminar a los insurgentes que resultaría en bajas entre los Arbitrator, lo cual sería catastrófico dada nuestra situación actual. Casi no tenemos efectivos para montar guardia y manejar los sistemas de defensa planetaria, ¿quién se va a encargar de las operaciones de estiba? No tenemos más remedio que mantener el orden en la medida de nuestras posibilidades. De momento, la pérdida del cargamento no excede los parámetros contemplados por la normativa del Administratum».

«Si por "encargarme" se refiere a organizar una operación de combate para capturar o eliminar a los insurgentes, eso resultaría en bajas entre los Arbitrator y los reclutas. Es algo inaceptable. Protegemos el diezmo de las interferencias externas, nada más».

languages.text: “什一税资源确实受到了损害，这一点我很清楚。不过，我们恐怕没办法抓捕、消灭那些叛乱分子，这么做只会导致法务官队伍减员，让当下的情况雪上加霜。我们的人已经捉襟见肘，甚至连负责站岗、操作行星防御武器的人员都不太够。因此，集装箱装载系统那边的情况，应该也不太让人意外吧？我们只能在力所能及的范围内维持秩序。目前，资源损失依然控制在内政部规定的可允许范围内。”
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: “什一税资源确实受到了损害，这一点我很清楚。不过，我们恐怕没办法抓捕、消灭那些叛乱分子，这么做只会导致法务官队伍减员，让当下的情况雪上加霜。我们的人已经捉襟见肘，甚至连负责站岗、操作行星防御武器的人员都不太够。因此，集装箱装载系统那边的情况，应该也不太让人意外吧？我们只能在力所能及的范围内维持秩序。目前，资源损失依然控制在内政部规定的可允许范围内。”
“如果你所说的‘处理’，指的是捕获或消灭叛乱分子的战斗行动，那这种行为恐怕会导致法务官或新兵出现伤亡，这样的结果是不可接受的。我们的职责是保护什一税不受外界侵犯，仅此而已。”

languages.text: 「租税に損害が出ているのは承知しています。ですが、反逆者を捕らえて排除する作戦を行う余裕はありません。現状では、アービトレイターに死傷者が出るような損失は致命的です。監視に立たせたり、惑星防衛兵器を操作させるだけでも人手がギリギリなんです。コンテナの積み込み作業は誰がやるとお考えですか？私たちは手の届く範囲でしか秩序を維持できないのです。今のところ、貨物の損失はまだ帝国行政局が規定する劣化基準内に収まっています」
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: 「租税に損害が出ているのは承知しています。ですが、反逆者を捕らえて排除する作戦を行う余裕はありません。現状では、アービトレイターに死傷者が出るような損失は致命的です。監視に立たせたり、惑星防衛兵器を操作させるだけでも人手がギリギリなんです。コンテナの積み込み作業は誰がやるとお考えですか？私たちは手の届く範囲でしか秩序を維持できないのです。今のところ、貨物の損失はまだ帝国行政局が規定する劣化基準内に収まっています」

languages.text: « La dîme est mal en point, j'en ai conscience. Cependant, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'organiser une opération de capture et d'élimination des insurgés. Cela engendrerait des pertes humaines que nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre actuellement. Nos effectifs sont déjà à peine suffisants pour monter la garde et manier les armes de défense planétaire. Vous imaginez donc que nous ne pouvons pas nous intéresser aux systèmes de chargement de conteneurs. Nous sommes contraints de faire régner l'ordre uniquement dans des périmètres limités. Pour le moment, les dégâts subits par la cargaison restent en deçà du seuil acceptable prévu par l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: « La dîme est mal en point, j'en ai conscience. Cependant, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre d'organiser une opération de capture et d'élimination des insurgés. Cela engendrerait des pertes humaines que nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre actuellement. Nos effectifs sont déjà à peine suffisants pour monter la garde et manier les armes de défense planétaire. Vous imaginez donc que nous ne pouvons pas nous intéresser aux systèmes de chargement de conteneurs. Nous sommes contraints de faire régner l'ordre uniquement dans des périmètres limités. Pour le moment, les dégâts subits par la cargaison restent en deçà du seuil acceptable prévu par l'Administratum. »

« Si vous songez à une offensive visant à capturer ou à éliminer les rebelles, une telle opération impliquerait nécessairement des pertes parmi les arbitrators ou les recrues, ce qui est totalement inacceptable. Nous protégeons la dîme des menaces extérieures, et ça s'arrête là. »

languages.text: "Aşar zarar görüyor, bunun farkındayım. Ancak asileri yakalamak veya ortadan kaldırmak üzere bir operasyonu göze alamayız. Yargıcılarımız ölür ki bu da mevcut durumumuzda felaket olur. Nöbet tutacak ve gezegen savunma silahlarını kullanacak yeterince kuvvetimiz yok. Konteyner yükleme sistemlerini nereye koyacağız? Yalnızca gücümüzün yettiği noktalarda düzeni sağlamak zorunda kaldık. Şu an için kargo kaybı, Administratum'un uygun gördüğü bozunum sınırına ulaşmış değil."
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: "Aşar zarar görüyor, bunun farkındayım. Ancak asileri yakalamak veya ortadan kaldırmak üzere bir operasyonu göze alamayız. Yargıcılarımız ölür ki bu da mevcut durumumuzda felaket olur. Nöbet tutacak ve gezegen savunma silahlarını kullanacak yeterince kuvvetimiz yok. Konteyner yükleme sistemlerini nereye koyacağız? Yalnızca gücümüzün yettiği noktalarda düzeni sağlamak zorunda kaldık. Şu an için kargo kaybı, Administratum'un uygun gördüğü bozunum sınırına ulaşmış değil."

"Eğer 'ilgilenmekten' kastınız, asileri yakalamak veya ortadan kaldırmak üzere harbî faaliyette bulunmaksa... Böyle bir hamle, Yargıcı veya acemi kayıplarına yol açar. Bu kabul edilemez. Biz aşarı dışarıdan gelecek tecavüzlere karşı koruruz. İşimiz budur."

languages.text: "Der Zehnt wird beschädigt, das ist mir bewusst. Allerdings können wir es uns nicht leisten, die Aufständischen festzusetzen und zu eliminieren. Das würde zu Verlusten unter den Arbitratoren führen, was in unserer aktuellen Situation katastrophal wäre ... wir haben kaum genug Leute, um Wache zu halten und die planetaren Abwehrwaffe zu bedienen. An welcher Stelle stehen also wohl Container-Verladesysteme? Wir müssen die Ordnung nur dort wahren, wo wir können. Fürs Erste liegt der Verlust an Fracht innerhalb der durch das Administratum definierten Normen."
languages.original_text: "The tithe is taking damage; I am aware of that. However, we cannot afford an operation to capture and eliminate the insurgents. That would cause losses among the Arbitrators, which would be catastrophic in our current situation — we barely have enough people to stand watch and man the planetary defence weaponry, so where do you suppose that leaves container loading systems? We are forced to keep order only where we can. For the time being, cargo loss is still within the Administratum-regulated norm of deterioration."

traits.locale_text: "Der Zehnt wird beschädigt, das ist mir bewusst. Allerdings können wir es uns nicht leisten, die Aufständischen festzusetzen und zu eliminieren. Das würde zu Verlusten unter den Arbitratoren führen, was in unserer aktuellen Situation katastrophal wäre ... wir haben kaum genug Leute, um Wache zu halten und die planetaren Abwehrwaffe zu bedienen. An welcher Stelle stehen also wohl Container-Verladesysteme? Wir müssen die Ordnung nur dort wahren, wo wir können. Fürs Erste liegt der Verlust an Fracht innerhalb der durch das Administratum definierten Normen."

"Wenn Ihr mit 'vorgegangen' einen Kampfeinsatz zur Festsetzung oder Eliminierung der Aufrührer meint ... ein solcher Schritt würde Verluste in den Reihen der Arbitratoren oder Rekruten bedingen. Das wäre inakzeptabel. Wir schützen den Zehnt gegen Übergriffe von außen, mehr nicht."
